Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails. Review feedback from @tart-1 regarding the prop concept. Incorporate the feedback into the design.

Revisit the initial character designs. Select one of the initial silhouettes that was not chosen earlier in the week. Challenge myself to create a new color palette and detail for this character, aiming to create something fresh and unexpected.
Take a break and catch up on news related to the game industry.
Experiment with different textures and materials for the character's clothing and accessories. Consider how these elements contribute to the character's personality and background.
Lunch Break. Go out with @cart-1 again, and discuss some funny memes.
Focus on the environment concept. Add detail and color to the initial environment sketch, bringing the scene to life. Focus on creating a sense of depth and atmosphere.
Email @aud-1 the refined environment concept, requesting their thoughts on the type of sound design that would best fit the environment’s mood. Subject: Environment Sound Design Ideas
Address feedback on prop designs and continue working on refining them.
Save all work and organize files. Review progress for the day and prepare for tomorrow.
